contentList.content: Make Indomitable apply before a status is applied, preventing the initial CC and subsequent attempts until Indomitable is removed.
Character is vulnerable to debilitating statuses, and cannot resist them until they recover.
If enabled, Indomitable will trigger when a resisted status is attempted, rather than when it's removed. In this mode, Indomitable lasts for 1 turn only.

Make Indomitable apply on status removal, rather than before a status is applied.
This means a character will be immune to knockdowns/etc only after it is initially applied and removed. (Default)

Character has immunity to debilitating statuses.
Afterwards, Exhaustion will set in, preventing Indomitable for 3 turns.
